name: 7th Defense
description:
New inhabitable planets have been discovered in a distant solar system! In an effort to colonize the planets you must protect them form the relentless horde of deadly aliens.

Made as part of a 48-hour game jam hosted on itch.io

Credits:

Programmer: Austin Taylor / Website: https://austinxtaylor.com/
